name: 東江
message: "...I have to say, I'm impressed that you managed to break free of the song and make it all the way here."

name: 東江
message: "As you just experienced, that song causes the listener to relive his most traumatic memories. Greatly amplified, of course."

name: 東江
message: "Most people suffer irreversible brain damage, but you managed to come through it unscathed. I should have expected no less from one of the chosen."

name: ミンク
message: "...He's the one who broke the song, not me."

name: 東江
message: "Aoba? Now that you mention it, are you sure you're alright without him?"

name: ミンク
message: "You're the one I'm after. He's got nothing to do with it."

name: 東江
message: "Fascinating. So you sent him to safety."

name: 東江
message: "I didn't take you for the type to form attachments... He must be something special."

name: ミンク
message: "Who said anything about safety? Forget about him."

name: ミンク
message: "I've had enough of your bullshit. I've been waiting for this moment. ...Now, you die."

name: 東江
message: "Let's not be hasty. I'll let you in on a little secret. I suspected you might make it here, so I made a few preparations."

name: 東江
message: "You wish to kill me. Splendid. My fate is in God's hands."

name: 東江
message: "But we don't want the end to be boring, do we?"

name: 東江
message: "I wasn't sure I would need to use it... but in any case, I thought it might be fun to give you a bit of a challenge. Nothing fancy, I assure you."

name: 東江
message: "I won't use any weapons. I won't put up a fight. But oh, you will struggle. Now... this is my gift to you."

name: 東江
message: "You will not die. You cannot die. No matter what happens, live."
